metadata.title: CVE-2021-3121 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GoGo Protobuf before 1.3.2.plugin/unmarshal/unmarshal.go lacks certain index validation, aka the"skippy peanut butter" issue.

criterions.comment: golang-gogoprotobuf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
